desc: A W-Engine produced by recycling abandoned Bangboo shells. Though it's made from scrapped parts, it still caused some distress among Bangboo lovers. desc3: A W-Engine produced by recycling abandoned Bangboo shells. Its electrode cores made of recycled metals can release high-voltage charges.
